parameters:
\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0001]\N<Supreme Commander>Thanks to your efforts, we're starting to see the light in
our struggle against the BB gang.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Supreme Commander>Given the situation, the enemy's BB gang will probably start
to get serious from now on.
\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFFF[1090Ogi_0000]\N<Supreme Commander>Please, don't let your guard down in the battles to come.
\FX[FFF]\AA[F]\FFF[1020Eriza_0000]You've come at a good time. Feel free to relax a bit!
ジャスティスナイツについて

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0009]\N<Eliza>Thanks to your splendid achievements, the atmosphere among
the Justice Knights has improved.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>The development team, which was under Guido's charge, has
come under my supervision, making the development and supply
of combat items to the field smoother. I can also manage the
development team's budget now♪
\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Flare>Is that so♪ Then, the battles ahead might become easier♪

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0004]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0008]\N<Eliza>Indeed♪ You should check out the development room in the
shopping mall. There should be more items available for
development♪

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0014]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0007]\N<Eliza>(...But the development team's budget was shockingly huge...
With this much budget for such results, it can only be
assumed that Guido was embezzling funds...)

\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Flare>Um, about Guido, who went missing during the recent
attack...

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0003]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0010]\N<Eliza>Yes. When we examined his room and such, there were no signs
of struggle or resistance, everything was in a clean state.

\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0010]\N<Flare>I see... Then, maybe he was abducted not in his room, but in
a hallway or some other place...?
\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0010]\N<Eliza>Hmm. That might be the case, or it might not.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0004]\N<Eliza>The lack of any traces makes it seem like he wasn't
'abducted' but 'left willingly.'

\FX[F]\AA[F]\M[jump]\F[1010Furea_0003]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0004]\N<Flare>What!? But he was the leader of the development team! To
abandon his responsibilities and flee alone, how could...!!

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0003]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>Well, including that part, we're currently investigating.
I'll let you know once we have the results.

\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Flare>Um, about Kenji-sama, it seems he hasn't been participating
in strategy meetings lately...?

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0005]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0005]\N<Eliza>Hmm. We've restricted the information about the Justice
Knights that we pass to him. In other words...
\FX[F]\AA[F]\M[jump]\F[1010Furea_0011]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0017]\N<Flare>What!? E-Eliza-san!? No, no, no, that's not right!!
\FX[F]\AA[F]\M[jump]\F[1010Furea_0001]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0009]\N<Flare>Enough! Please stop with the bad jokes!

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0001]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>With the recent attack and all, knowing too much information
could actually put him in danger, that's what we've been
discussing.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0001]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>In a way, we're restricting the information we give him to
protect him.
\FX[F]\AA[F]\F[1010Furea_0003]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Flare>I see...? But is that really necessary...?

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0003]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0000]\N<Eliza>It is... For instance, let's say he was abducted during the
recent attack.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0003]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0004]\N<Eliza>If he knew some sort of crucial secret, the enemy being an
evil organization would likely force him to spill it, even
through torture.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0003]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0003]\N<Eliza>However, if he truly knows nothing, then depending on the
situation, they might deem him 'worthless' and decide to
release him... That's the idea.

\FX[F]\AA[FFFFF]\F[1010Furea_0003]\FFFFF[1020Eriza_0009]\N<Eliza>So, it's better not to know too much confidential
information.
